Spore based probiotics are better because they can thrive through stomach acid. Other probiotics don't make it through stomach acid. Also, I would look into vit d supplements more. Is it true that Homeopathy is canceled out by essential oils and vice versa? I keep hearing that but I have no idea if it's true
@Cassie Devenyi thanks i will!

homeopathy means that the original "active" has been diluted down so much that it's pretty much water. So I don't think it would interact with essential oils at all! I recommend the podcast "sawbones", they have episodes on essential oils and homeopathy which helped me learn more :)
